mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tl_d_program_category ORDER BY program_category_name ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tl_d_program VALUES( tl_d_program_seq.nextval, #{staff_pk}, #{program_category_pk}, #{prg_name}, #{prg_schedule}, #{prg_apply_deadline}, #{prg_main_image}, #{prg_contents}, #{prg_location}, #{prg_apply_number}, #{prg_is_attend}, SYSDATE )
